body_html:
I have sovled this problem by add linker_flag: "-Wl,-rpath,you-local-gcc-lib-path" to the toolchainsection with host_system_name: "local" in the third_party/gpus/crosstool/CROSSTOOL file .

This problem is caused by exec env - ,which clear LD_LIBRARY_PATH, resulted protoc can't find you gcc lib
body_text:
I have sovled this problem by add linker_flag: "-Wl,-rpath,you-local-gcc-lib-path" to the toolchainsection with host_system_name: "local" in the third_party/gpus/crosstool/CROSSTOOL file .
This problem is caused by exec env - ,which clear LD_LIBRARY_PATH, resulted protoc can't find you gcc lib
body:
I have sovled this problem by add `linker_flag: "-Wl,-rpath,you-local-gcc-lib-path"` to the `toolchain`section with `host_system_name: "local"` in the `third_party/gpus/crosstool/CROSSTOOL` file .

This problem is caused by `exec env -` ,which clear LD_LIBRARY_PATH, resulted protoc can't find you gcc lib
